nodes.text: The Ridgeside Sentry Post was an outpost operated by the reconstituted Sith Empire in the Jundland Wastes on the planet Tatooine during the Cold War.

Ridgeside Sentry Post was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It appears as one of the Imperial settlements on the planet Tatooine.
